name: Textgenerator
body: change or store the sample in the sample.txt; then run the code; but it may read one paragraph text, but our code cannot adjust the length of the generated text. run again; the result show the backward word is choose randomly after the forward word; basically, after the program scan all sample text. for example, the program will remember the words have appeared after" the", then it will generate the text by choosing a word randomly from the words remember in the forward step, then we can get the different results, just like in the class.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
